betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§6Osgloglas Ingot§r (§7asides from having a goofy name§r) is an §ealloy of three materials§r and is considered §epart of the refined materials family§r. Osgloglas is special in §5Tinkers' Construct§r as it's tools has the §e"brown magic" trait§r, which allows you to set a §ewaypoint anywhere with a keybind which you can teleport to later§r (§7limited to only one waypoint, existing portal gets overriden if a new portal is set§r).

To make it, place §6Osmium Ingot§rs, §6Glowstone Ingot§rs, and §6Refined Obsidian Ingot§rs into an §6Alloy Tank§r or combine them in the §3Smeltery§r.
